summary: Sword of the Uruk-Hai from Lord of the Rings
descriptionHtml:
The Sword of the Uruk-Hai from Lord of the Rings!

Thanks to Phate3 who put it ingame for me! ... for US!

I don\'t know if downloading with \'\'download with manager\'\' works. if not download and install manually.
manual install: extract the files to your Skyrim/data folder.

The sword is purchasable from Eourlund in Whiterun, craftable, upgradable and enchantable. 
The blood layers works so the sword will be stained with blood.
All thanks to Phate3 who did that.

I made the model and texture

credits to lord of the rings for the design of the sword

credits to Phate3 who made it a stand-alone mod, made it craftable and enchantable, did the blood layer and amde it work in-game.

UPDATE: Phate3 updated the .esp so the sword is catagorized in the orcish section instead of dwarven. it now has less damage.

original is still there for download should you want more damage, note that it is found in the dwarven section then when you want to craft it

model made by me
texture made by me
author: mandarinn
